description: Wall Clock on Bracket; Case by Antoine Foullet (French, 1710 - 1775, master 1749), and movement by Lapina (French, born 1801); Paris, France; 1764; Oak veneered with panels of green, red, and cream painted horn, and brass; gilt bronze; enameled metal; glass; 118.7 × 49.5 × 28.6 cm (46 3/4 × 19 1/2 × 11 1/4 in.); 75.DB.7; J.
